title: Revises provisions governing the Economic Development Electric Rate Rider Program. (BDR 58-9)
Exempts certain manufacturers of electric passenger cars from the statutory requirements relating to franchises for the sale of new vehicles and repairs or maintenance on motor vehicles. (BDR 43-10)
Revises provisions governing the general tax on insurance premiums. (BDR 57-8)
Amends the Standing Rules of the Assembly of the 77th Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-3)
Provides for the appointment of attaches. (BDR R-5)
Provides that no allowances will be paid for the 28th Special Session of the Nevada Legislature for periodicals, stamps, stationery or communications. (BDR R-7)
Adopts the Joint Rules of the Senate and Assembly for the 28th Special Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-1)
Adopts the Rules of the Senate for the 28th Special Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-2)
Provides that no allowances will be paid for the 28th Special Session of the Nevada Legislature for periodicals, stamps, stationery or communications. (BDR R-6)
Recognizes the appointment of the Senate staff. (BDR R-4)
